name: GolfingDay
description:
Golfing is essential to leading a good and happy life. Make sure to golf once or twice a day, and you'll stay healthy! Plus, you might be the best golfer in the world, who knows?

This is GolfingDay, your daily reminder that golfing is important.

Get as close as you can to the hole in only one strike.

Every 12 hours, a new hole is generated, same one for everybody. Be sure to come back and improve you score.

Features :

  • an online leaderboard ! stay connected to the internet, who knows what could happen if you're not D: !
  • no sound !
  • unlimited practice ! be sure to check it out before trying the real course

This crazy unpolished game was made for the 24th GM48 jam (theme One Shot) in 48h. It rank 50th but was first in "theme" B)
And yeah, the title in the game is a typo.
